properties.areaDesc: Dyer, TN; Obion, TN; Gibson, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:15AM CST until January 15 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Buttahatchie River...Obion River...Right Hand Chute Little River...
S.F. of the Forked Deer River...Saint Francis River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Obion River near Obion
* from Sunday January 12 until Tuesday January 14.
* At 09 AM Friday the stage was...24.7 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 34.5 feet on Sunday January 12.
* Flood stage is 34.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Sunday January 12 and
continue to rise to near 34.5 feet by Sunday January 12. The river
will fall below flood stage by Tuesday January 14.
At 35.0 feet, Several secondary roads and large areas of farm land
are flooded in northern Dyer County. Flooding is occurring around
Rives in southeast Obion County..
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
